attributes.action: introduce legislation to control the amount and type of expenses MP's can claim and to force them to publish detailed open annual accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Borne of frustration and anger at MP Anne Kean's use of our money to fund a life policy on her 70 year old husbands life. MP's must fund such  purchases from their own high salaries , not from taxpayers money, such purchases must be forbidden in a free democratic taxpaying society. Such people are supposed to lead by example such actions promote fraud

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
